title: AI-Made Tata Sierra Ad Goes Viral, And It's Not From Tata Motors
text:
Car News
AI-Made Tata Sierra Ad Goes Viral, And It’s Not From Tata Motors
An AI-generated TVC for the upcoming Tata Sierra has gone viral online. Created by a YouTube user, the cinematic video showcases the SUV across ice, desert, and coastal terrains.
AI-Made Tata Sierra Ad Goes Viral, And It’s Not From Tata Motors (Credits: Kapil Dev Anand / YouTube)
While we wait for Tata Motors to officially launch the new Tata Sierra in India, an AI-generated TV commercial is making waves online, and it’s not from the company itself.
The SUV, first revealed in a near-production avatar at the 2025 Auto Expo, has already caught the attention of fans. Now, a YouTube channel named Kapil Dev Anand has uploaded what looks like an unofficial promo video for the Sierra, and it’s grabbing eyeballs for all the right reasons.
The video kicks off with a dramatic close-up of the Sierra’s front end, focusing on its headlamp. Then, in a surprising twist, the SUV smashes into a huge ice boulder, sending shards flying everywhere.
The next scene shifts to a desert landscape, where the Sierra is shown parked with sand dramatically flowing off its bonnet. Then we’re back in snowy terrain, where the SUV is seen powering through a bend on a snow-covered road, kicking up snow in style.
From there, the video takes us to high-altitude dirt trails, followed by scenes of the Sierra taking on sand dunes, complete with an action-packed shot of it jumping over one. A scenic drive along a coastal road, surrounded by palm trees (possibly somewhere in Kerala), follows next.
It all wraps up with a peaceful shot of the Sierra parked on a cliff, rear section facing the ocean, overlooking the sea. Though this AI-generated ad isn’t an official Tata Motors production, it certainly manages to capture the adventurous vibe the brand is going for with the new Sierra. And if nothing else, it’s got fans even more excited for what’s to come.
(Source: Kapil Dev Anand / YouTube)
